text: Andrea Tenuta (born 6 January 1963 in Montevideo) is an Uruguayan-Argentina actress, singer, and dancer. She is the daughter of Uruguayan actors Juan Manuel Tenuta and Adela Gleijer. She made her film debut in 1983 with the film The arrangement. In 1985, she worked on the Oscar winning film, The official story. She later appeared in Esperando la carroza. In 2012 she appeared in Holmes & Watson. Madrid Days. She married José Luis Garci . == References == == Other websites == * Andrea Tenuta: «Está entre Mihura y el Berlanga de la primera época» www.abc.es Category:Uruguayan actors Category:Singers Category:Dancers Category:1963 births Category:Living people
title: Andrea Tenuta
